Package Extbase\Validation\Validator

Interface summary

Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_ObjectValidatorInterface Contract for an object validator
Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_ValidatorInterface Contract for a validator

Class summary

Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_AbstractCompositeValidator An abstract composite validator with consisting of other validators
Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_AbstractObjectValidator An abstract Object Validator
Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_AbstractValidator Abstract validator
Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_AlphanumericValidator Validator for alphanumeric strings
Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_ConjunctionValidator Validator to chain many validators in a conjunction (logical and). So every validator has to be valid, to make the whole conjunction valid.
Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_DateTimeValidator Validator for DateTime objects
Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_DisjunctionValidator Validator to chain many validators in a disjunction (logical or). So only one validator has to be valid, to make the whole disjunction valid. Errors are only returned if all validators failed.
Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_EmailAddressValidator Validator for email addresses
Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_FloatValidator Validator for floats
Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_GenericObjectValidator A generic object validator which allows for specifying property validators
Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_IntegerValidator Validator for integers
Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_NotEmptyValidator Validator for not empty values
Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_NumberRangeValidator Validator for general numbers
Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_NumberValidator Validator for general numbers
Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_RawValidator A validator which accepts any input
Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_RegularExpressionValidator Validator based on regular expressions
Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_StringLengthValidator Validator for string length
Tx_Extbase_Validation_Validator_TextValidator Validator for text
